nodes.bodyText: After further review, this code should be placed after this line in AsyncTeleport so we do not create extraneous sync loads https://github.com/EssentialsX/Essentials/blob/2.x/Essentials/src/com/earth2me/essentials/AsyncTeleport.java#L181

I still don't think this causes any sync loads. It's just getting the position of the block, not the block itself. Reducing sync loads in LocationUtil would probably be best for a separate PR, as that is not the concern of this one.
